response.job_title: Electronic Engineer | SQL Server | ETL | Data science | Python | Machine Learning
response.summary: Electronic engineer, with experience in the data area, carrying out ETL processes on relational databases, and skills in the development of machine learning models either to solve continuous and / or categorical variables problems that solve research and research problems. deal. Through critical thinking, context analysis, and the use of languages such as Python and SQL, among others, thus being able to develop models for solving problems and / or making important decisions.
response.skills: Análisis de datos, Python, Machine learning , Aprendizaje automático, Extraer, transformar y cargar (ETL), Ciencia de datos, Microsoft SQL Server

profile_positions.description:
- Development of price prediction models for real estate (Decision tree, Adaboost Ramdon Forest)
- Development of models for Time series (PROPHET, ARIMA and SARIMAX)
profile_positions.title: Data Science Intern

profile_positions.description:
• Development of ETL processes and use of SQL in relational databases
• Automation of processes using Macros (VBA), Power Automate and Excel Scripts
• Generation of reports in Excel and PowerBI
profile_positions.title: Business Partner

company.name: Banco Davivienda
company.description: En Davivienda creemos en un mundo financiero sin barreras que facilite la vida a las personas, las empresas, las ciudades y municipios. Por esta razón hoy somos más de 19.000 personas innovando y creando cada día soluciones y ofertas exclusivas para 10 millones de clientes que permitan una mayor inclusión financiera y un mayor desarrollo sostenible.
